name: Slimeatory Slime Simulator
description:
Become the slime mixing master you were always meant to be! In Slimeatory Ultimate Slime Simulator, with the most fun and detailed slime crafting simulation ever seen in a mobile game, use the hundreds of items at your disposal to craft the ultimate collection of slimes you've always wanted.


And when you're done making them, play with them! Use our super satisfying advanced slime physics simulation to play with your crafted slimes as if they were actually right at your fingertips! Recieve coins for every slime you craft, and then spend them on more amazing items to use, including colors, slime charms, accessories, and base materials!


Even more features including special slime challenges straight from Ameerah are on the way, so stay tuned! Your slime crafting career is truly only getting started.
